description: This JavaScript file defines an immediately invoked function expression (IIFE) that contains a function to scale a web page layout to fit the window. It attaches event listeners to resize, orientation change, and DOM content loaded to invoke the scaling function, ensuring responsive behavior.
external_files: none (uses standard DOM and window objects)

methods.name: scaleToFit()
methods.description: Calculates scaling factor based on window size and applies CSS transform to scale the '.scale-container' element to fit the viewport.
